metadata.title: CVE-2024-2613 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Data was not properly sanitized when decoding a QUIC ACK frame; this couldhave led to unrestricted memory consumption and a crash. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 124.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
